title: Portfolio-architecte-sophie-bluel
description: Development of an interactive architecture portfolio website using dynamic filters, DOM manipulation, and event handling in vanilla JavaScript.
objective: Build an interactive architecture portfolio website from a static mockup, making the gallery dynamic with pure JavaScript.
skills: DOM manipulation, event handling, API integration, and building an interface fully accessible via keyboard navigation.
improvements: Add alt attributes to all images, proper labels for form fields, and ensure full keyboard navigation accessibility.

title: Kasa
description: Full redesign of a property rental website as a React single-page application with reusable components and dynamic routing.
objective: Rebuild a real estate website as a dynamic and responsive single-page application using React.
skills: React Router, reusable components, props management, responsive design, and code structure using Vite and SCSS.
improvements: Check heading hierarchy (H1, H2, H3), add meta descriptions for each page, and ensure keyboard navigation is accessible.

title: ArgentBank
description: Complete banking web app with user authentication, transaction management, and state handling via Redux.
objective: Develop a complete banking web application with user authentication and state management through Redux.
skills: React, Redux Toolkit, REST API, Node.js, MongoDB, state management, and JWT authentication.
improvements: Improve form error handling, add accessible validation messages, and optimize semantic HTML structure.

title: MonResto WordPress Theme
description: Commercial WordPress restaurant theme with WooCommerce integration and custom front-end animations.
objective: Design a commercial WordPress theme for restaurants with WooCommerce support and modern animations.
skills: Modular SCSS, front-end JavaScript, WordPress theme development, responsive layout, and UX optimization.
improvements: Work on SEO (title and meta description), improve contrast and accessibility for buttons and form elements.

title: AI Job Hunter
description: AI-powered automation tool that generates and sends customized job applications to remote offers.
objective: Automate the job-hunting process by generating personalized applications using artificial intelligence.
skills: Automation logic, OpenAI API integration, React UI design, and async data management.
improvements: Strengthen data security, improve accessibility for the dashboard, and add analytics features.

title: AI Theme2WP
description: Tool that converts static HTML templates into dynamic WordPress themes using AI assistance.
objective: Build an AI-powered tool that automatically converts static HTML templates into dynamic WordPress themes.
skills: Node.js, React, OpenAI API integration, front-end to PHP structure conversion.
improvements: Enhance HTML structure compatibility, improve UI accessibility, and add drag-and-drop features for template mapping.

title: AI Tarot Project
description: Interactive AI-powered tarot reading web app blending psychology and symbolic storytelling.
objective: Create an interactive tarot reading application that combines AI with symbolic psychology.
skills: React, Node.js, conversational logic, AI prompt management, and UX writing.
improvements: Add keyboard navigation, alt text for all cards, and improve color contrast for accessibility compliance.

title: AI Email Assistant
description: AI-based assistant that reads, summarizes, and writes emails automatically.
objective: Design an intelligent assistant capable of reading, summarizing, and writing emails automatically using AI.
skills: Python, IMAP/SMTP protocols, OpenAI API integration, and natural language processing.
improvements: Develop a responsive web interface, improve accessibility, and allow tone customization in generated emails.
